metadata.name: Automated Reporting
metadata.use_case: Blog post about Google Ads automation
metadata.notes: Shows transformation from manual chaos to automated efficiency

theme.concept: assembly line transforming chaotic data into organized reports
theme.visual_metaphor: conveyor system with transformation showing time compression

transformation.from: chaotic scattered data fragments representing five hours of manual work
transformation.to: neat organized stacked reports representing thirty minutes of automated work
transformation.transition_zone: gradual alignment as elements touch conveyor and transform

composition.visual_flow: chaos on left through system in center to order on right

colors.distribution: blue dominant for data elements, orange for conveyor and organized outputs

elements.background: scattered chaotic data fragments floating in disorganized cloud in upper left corner
elements.midground: smooth curved orange conveyor pathway cutting diagonally through center
elements.foreground: neat organized stacked blocks with orange edges and blue fills in lower right
key_objects: scattered fragments gradually aligning along conveyor
